pageContext.description: Double-edged; edges much worn. ? made from point of broken sword. Evans, p.211. Broad tang; possibly a rivet-hole has been broken out at the end.
pageContext.patina: Green; patch of blue oxide on tang.
pageContext.associations: Hoard of 32 pieces, Nos. 2490-2520, comprising 14 socketed celts & 3 moulds, 2 gouges & 1 mould, 2 socketed hammers, 2 anvils, 1 curved tanged blade, 1 ?ferrule, 1 ?end of bracelet, 1 ?orifice of mould, 1 whetstone, 2 pieces of metal.
pageContext.publications: Evans, Anc. Br. Imps. pp. 211-2, 442 - Fig. 253 - Hoard No. 105.,For full references, see socketed celt No. 2491.
pageContext.remarks: "The stock-in-trade of an ancient bronze founder." Evans, p.442
